Hi there, I'm trying to run the tests that were created by the scaffolds and generators, and I get this error...
Can you paste the test that fails here? (unit/seller_test.rb) The test is trying to test .path on some object that's not there.
Just to be clear, that error would be created if you did this:
FunnelStep.find(123) is nil, so maybe you haven't created one in your test. Or you rely on the id, which may be different on every run.
here's the "unit/seller_test.rb" content, I haven't even touched it yet as you can see

require 'test_helper'

class SellerTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
  # Replace this with your real tests.
  test "the truth" do
    assert true
  end
end
problem seems to come from troubles in my models. I initiated instance vars and constants by calling some libs in the head of the model and if I comment it I get passed the error...
mmm, you're definitely giving me something to look at, I'll see and get back to you, thx a lot
funny thing is, even problems in other models cause the test to fail, so I have to modify them all, not only the unit/tested one...
check your funnel_step, it seems you have an association in seller and other models, too
